edu.cmu.al.sampling

Class BasicSampling

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.al.sampling.BasicSampling
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    QBCstrategy, RandomStrategy, UncertaintyStrategy, UncertaintyStrategy_bound

    public abstract class BasicSampling
extends java.lang.Object
    Sampling is the base class of all sampling methods. It is responsible for providing some instances for user to label.
    Author:
    Yuanyuan Yang
